entry.title: Bitcoin-development Digest, Vol 40, Issue 9
entry.summary: Based on the given context, it appears as though a conversation has taken place where one person has made a statement that the other person acknowledges as making sense. However, without any further information or context provided, it is difficult to determine what the specific topic of discussion was. The conversation is followed by a line that says "An HTML attachment was scrubbed..." indicating that there may have been an email or message exchange between the two parties. However, without access to the actual attachment and additional context, it is impossible to know for sure what was included in the message.Overall, based on the limited information provided, it seems that the conversation may have been a brief and straightforward exchange between two individuals, with no significant details or announcements conveyed.
